description.displayText: Michelle interviewed quite well. Made thoughtful suggestions of interactive toys to help our child develop. She was very approachable and personable. Michelle was punctual. Sadly, all of those things presented were very surface based. She exhibited impatient behavior with our child. She spent a tremendous amount of time on her cell phone. She had expectations of being paid for a vacation that would've occurred roughly 6 weeks after her start date. And to make matters worse, she provided our family a 24 hour notice of her departure. During the interview process she was equally thrilled about the exact needs of our family as it pertained to duties/days/hours. It was very important for us to ensure that our Nanny was comfortable with a part-time 20 hour position. That in turn was exactly what Michelle stated the needs of her family were. She advised us on a Wednesday that her last day would be Thursday because she had a job interview Friday. She also stated that she may be able to assist us the following Monday/Tuesday and she would let us know. She left our home Thursday on her last day in a very awkward manner. She never followed up to advise if she could help us the following week due to her short notice. She never reached out to us after we promptly sent her payment to provide an update. Michelle essentially walked away from the job she never seemed fully committed to. I would not recommend utilizing her as your future nanny or babysitter. In the end she did us a favor. The temperament she had with our child, the way she exited the job position, and her expectations would've resulted in her dismissal. Please beware of her interview skills, and approachability. We were very excited about her knowledge and experience. Sadly, it was an awful facade.

description.displayText: Michelle cared for my two boys (now 2 & 4) since my youngest was 4 weeks old. She made watching a 4 week old and a 2 year old look easy. She has tons of experience with babies/kids, super confident and easy going which was always great for a stressed out mama like I. Never called out sick, always on time. She helped with all the milestones a baby has from bottle feeding, to eating solids, to sleep training, she even potty trained both my boys! She's the full package! I trust her more with my kids than i do my own family members. Snatch her up now before someone else does.

description.displayText: Michelle has cared for and loved my 6 month old as if she were her own and I am so grateful that we were able to find her! Michelle was always on time, plays, sings, reads, feeds, and cleans up after our daughter. She's also very knowledgeable of the milestones babies reach, and as a FTM I can't stress enough how helpful her tips have been! Any family is lucky to have Michelle join theirs!
description.originalText: Michelle has cared for and loved my 6 month old as if she were her own and I am so grateful that we were able to find her! Michelle was always on time, plays, sings, reads, feeds, and cleans up after our daughter. She's also very knowledgeable of the milestones babies reach, and as a FTM I can't stress enough how helpful her tips have been! Any family is lucky to have Michelle join theirs!

description.displayText: We found Michelle to be professional, capable and reliable throughout her time working for us as a nanny. She was always warm and attentive with our child, displaying a genuine love and affection for our child and the work she did. Our baby took to her immediately and was always very pleased to see her every morning when she arrived. We found her very pleasant to work with too, her easy-going nature meaning that she was always happy to work with us on those occasions where there might be a last minute change to our schedule meaning she might have to arrive early or stay later. It was very reassuring to know that in Michelle, we had a nanny who would always be accommodating, and who would always put our child's best interests at heart.

description.displayText: We were very pleased with Michelle when she interviewed with us - and she was a close choice and if our current girl doesn't work out for any reason - Michelle would be our pick!!! She is sweet, happy, caring, and my son took to her right away.  We would recommend Michelle to anyone who was looking for someone.
